remarks: Version of ~ elimh expressed using the conditional operator. (Contributed by BJ, 30-Sep-2019.)
statement:
bj-elimhyp.1 $e |- ( ( if- ( ch , ph , ps ) <-> ph ) -> ( ch <-> ta ) ) $.
bj-elimhyp.2 $e |- ( ( if- ( ch , ph , ps ) <-> ps ) -> ( th <-> ta ) ) $.
bj-elimhyp.3 $e |- th $.
bj-elimhyp $p |- ta $.
